page.title: 07LAMPORT HALL Library
page.content: When we went into the library and shut the door we couldn't find it again because it looked like a book case full of books.When we looked at them they had joke names like "The Carpenters Secret". There is a table which is special,it turns into some steps to reach the books in the top shelf.The books are very old. There is a garden gnome in a glass case.It was the first one in England. Sir Charles Isham brought gnomes back from Germany for his alpine garden.He believed in fairies and wrote books about them,but his children thought he was daft and when he died they smashed them all up except this one.
